articles.title: Future Apple Watch Models Will Reportedly Ditch Intel Modems, And Transition To MediaTek’s Solutions, Which Will Make These Devices 5G-Ready - Wccftech
articles.description: Intel models are currently being used in current Apple Watch models, but future releases might start featuring solutions from MediaTek
articles.content: Current-generation Apple Watch models are probably the only devices whose internals comprise of Intels modems. However, it appears that this alliance will come to an end, with the California-based gi… [+2313 chars]
